✨ Streams in the Desert - April 27 ✝️

"I am the living one! I was dead, but now I am alive forever and ever! And I hold the keys of death and the grave." ✝️ (Revelation 1:18)

🌸 Easter lilies! Speak to me again this morning your eternal lesson of life after death - the comfort you've brought to so many grieving hearts.

📖 Wise old Bible! Let me read again your sure promise that "to die is gain."

✍️ Poets! Recite your verses that echo the Gospel of everlasting life in every line.

🎶 Singers! Burst forth with joyful songs - let me hear those familiar resurrection hymns once more!

🌳 Trees, flowers, birds, sea, sky and wind - whisper it, sing it, echo it! Let every atom pulse with this truth until the air vibrates with it!

Tell it again and again until hope becomes certainty, and certainty becomes unshakable knowledge. Until we, like Paul, can face death with triumph, unwavering faith, and shining faces.

😔 O grieving ones who walk where cypress grows,
⚰️ Among the graves where loved ones find repose,
☀️ Lift up your eyes to heaven's endless blue -
✝️ For Christ has made all things forever new!

🌸 No time for sadness - weave bright Easter flowers,
🔔 Let joyful bells chase away sorrow's hours,
❤️ Feel your soul stir with resurrection's power,
🎶 As Easter songs ring out this glorious hour!

⛓️ If Christ still lay locked in death's prison cell,
😢 Then bitter tears would be appropriate still.
✨ But He has risen! Death could not prevail!
🎉 So dry your tears - let joy your heart regale!

✝️ A pastor writing his Easter sermon suddenly realized: "Christ is ALIVE right now! His grave is empty - He's not the great 'I was' but the great 'I AM'!" He jumped up excitedly, pacing as the truth overwhelmed him. Easter's glorious reality!

🌸 We believe every grave grows an Easter lily. 👼 Every tomb has an angel. We serve a living Lord! Don't just look back worshiping at His grave - look up to worship the Christ who lives! And because He lives, we too shall live forever!

—Abbott
